unparsed_output:
**Answer:**

No Debarment. Institution hereby represents and warrants to TGRD that:

(a) Institution has never been, is not and will not employ, or use in any capacity to perform Services, a person or entity debarred under Section 306(a) or (b) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (the "Act"), nor is institution employed by, in partnership with, a stockholder in, or otherwise affiliated with, a person or entity who has been so debarred; and

(b) Institution shall immediately notify TGRD in writing in the event that any of the foregoing representations and warranties should become untrue or if Institution becomes aware of any fact or circumstance which is reasonably expected to make any such representation or warranty to become untrue.
